feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 27 at 5:50AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Wintry Mix of Precipitation Possible this Weekend... Periods of snow are expected into the weekend. A total of 1 to 3 inches is expected. Snow may change to freezing rain in some areas on Friday, Saturday, and Saturday night with a light glaze of ice possible on exposed surfaces.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Kobuk Valley; Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon River; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley; Northern Seward Peninsula

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued October 27 at 9:28AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...PM-10 HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR THE YUMA AREA SUNDAY... The Arizona Department of Environmental Quality (ADEQ) has issued a PM-10 High Pollution Advisory for the Yuma area on Sunday. An episode of strong and gusty winds is forecast to generate widespread blowing dust that may result in local PM-10 concentrations that pose a health risk. Adverse health effects

entry.summary: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Iowa, southeast Minnesota and southwest and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Saturday.

entry.title: Freezing Fog Advisory issued October 27 at 9:42AM MDT until October 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility below one quarter mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential ice on bridges and untreated surfaces.
entry.cap:areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 1:48AM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MDT Sunday.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range
